B2 the state of being known or recognized by many people because of your achievements, skills, etc.: rise to fame She first rose to fame as a singer at the age of 16.fame and fortune She moved to London in search of fame and fortune. The town's fame rests on its beautiful cathedral. Synonyms
celebrity
renown formal
